item.title: Incentivizing Quality Text Generation via Statistical Contracts
item.description: Cost-robust contracts, inspired by statistical hypothesis tests, incentivize quality in LLM text generation, overcoming the moral hazard of pay-per-token models.

item.title: Simplified and Generalized Masked Diffusion for Discrete Data
item.description: Simplified and generalized masked diffusion models achieve state-of-the-art results in discrete data generation, surpassing previous methods in text and image modeling.
